```{r quality_control}
#| echo: false
qc_print <- qc %>%
  filter(severity > 0) %>%
  mutate(
    test = case_when(
      severity == 0 ~ "✓",
      severity == 1 ~ "✗",
      severity == 2 ~ "✗✗",
      TRUE ~ "✗✗✗"
    ),
    color = ifelse(severity == 0, "green", "red")
  ) %>%
  arrange(desc(severity_value), category, name)

if (nrow(qc_print) > 0) {
  qc_print %>%
    transmute(
      Category = category,
      Name = name,
      Value = value,
      Condition = code,
      Severity = test
    ) %>%
    kbl(format = "html") %>%
    kable_styling() %>%
    kable_paper() %>%
    column_spec(
      5,
      color = qc_print$color
    ) %>%
    column_spec(
      1:5,
      tooltip = qc_print$message
    )
} else {
  knitr::asis_output("✓ All checks succeeded!")
}
```
